import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Save Episodes for Current User"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/v1/me/episodes"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Save one or more episodes to the current user's library. This API endpoint is in beta and could change without warning.

**Note:** Authorization scopes- **user-library-modify**

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ids","in":"query","schema":{"type":"string","example":"5oSNPcnWLTSMSgiHRh3uut,66kaHwOsflclccOPOEMhQw,2QdGXayP2y0N2z78Jp4q6S"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"ids":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","example":"string"},"example":["string"]}}},"examples":{"Save Episodes for Current User":{"value":{"ids":["string"]}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
